history.proof: srun best use: Nat.divide_antisym unfold: divides, Nat.divide.

original: intros. intros H1 H2. apply Nat.div_mod_unique in H1. apply Nat.div_mod_unique in H2. destruct H1 as [H1a H1b]. destruct H2 as [H2a H2b]. assert (H3: x * (x / y) = y * (y / x)). + rewrite H1b, H2b. reflexivity. + apply Nat.mul_eq_0_r in H3. * apply Nat.eq_mul_0_r in H3. apply Nat.lt_irrefl in H3. contradiction. * apply Nat.lt_irrefl.
